import React from 'react' import avatar from '../../../assets/img/ava.jpg' import styles from './popUpMessage.module.css' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import { reduxForm } from 'redux-form' import { createField } from '../FormControls/FormControls' import { required, voidValue } from '../../../utils/validators/validator' import { messageFromPopUp } from '../../../redux/messages-reducer' import { connect } from 'react-redux' const PopUpMessage = ({ user, closePopup, messageFromPopUp }) => { const id = user.id || user.userId const name = user.name || user.fullName return
New message
Open full chat with {name}

{name}

Offline

{ messageFromPopUp(data, user) closePopup() }} />
} const addMessagePopup = (props) => { return
{createField(null, 'messagePopup', [required, voidValue], 'textarea', null, null, { cols: 57.5, rows: 8 })}
} const AddMessagePopupFormRedux = reduxForm({ form: 'message-popup' })(addMessagePopup) export default connect(null, { messageFromPopUp })(PopUpMessage)
